resources.string: A proxy with this label already exists.
Enter a custom label for the new proxy
Label and url can not be empty.
Subscription with the same label already exists

No Collection of Personal Data
We do not collect, store, or process any personal information or data related to your use of the App, including but not limited to IP addresses, browsing activity, or server configurations.

No Proxy Servers Provided
The App is a graphical user interface (GUI) client for the Xray core. We do not provide any proxy servers or offer VPN services directly. Users have full responsibility for configuring their own servers and connections through the App, ensuring privacy and control over their network setup.

Learn more: https://exclude0122.github.io/docs/privacy-policy.html
Report technical issues or suggest new features
Restart the app for this setting to take effect
Use pure black background in dark theme
"Write logs to files. To view log files, use a file explorer app (e.g. Material files) and add XiVPN as an external storage. "
Sniffing domains from traffic data and replace the destination address by the sniffed domain.
Keep the original destination address and only use sniffed domain for routing.

To update geoip / geosite database:

  • Use a file explorer app (e.g. Material files) and add XiVPN as an external storage
  • Download geoip.dat from https://github.com/v2fly/geoip/releases/latest/download/geoip.dat
  • Download geosite.dat from https://github.com/v2fly/domain-list-community/releases/latest/download/dlc.dat
  • Replace geoip.dat and geosite.dat with downloaded files
